abstract: Youku plans to buy its biggest competitor, Tudou, in anticipation of regulatory changes that could allow online video sites to play a role in the nation’s media sector.
snippet: Youku plans to buy its biggest competitor, Tudou, in anticipation of regulatory changes that could allow online video sites to play a role in the nation’s media sector.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI — Youku, a leading Chinese online video Web site, is buying its biggest domestic competitor, Tudou, in an acquisition valued at $1.1 billion.

headline.main: 2 Video Web Sites in China Plan a Merger

abstract: China reported its biggest trade deficit in at least 22 years, and investors paused to consider the impact of a slowing Chinese economy.
snippet: China reported its biggest trade deficit in at least 22 years, and investors paused to consider the impact of a slowing Chinese economy.
lead_paragraph: Stocks were mixed on Monday in light trading as investors weighed whether an economic slowdown in China could lead to an easing of monetary policy.

headline.main: Slowdown in China Weighs on Wall St.
headline.print_headline: Slowdown in China Weighs on Wall St.
